0.1.0.description: My first tiny package for Atom, select a word and reverse letters

readme:
# Ukuhlanekezela package
This package is a tiny test for a course of RIA to reverse letters of a word.

####How does it work ?

> Select a word press <kbd>CTRL</kbd>+<kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>o</kbd> 
and it reverse letters of the word.

####Example:

```
"Github"

will turn into

"buhtiG"

```
